NewsArticle.Title: Server Downtime Compensation
NewsArticle.Content:
Server Downtime Compensation
We are holding a 25% extra EXP/AP event as compensation for the server downtime that occurred during October 11-12th. This event will begin on October 12th and END on October 15th. Registered accounts only.
Kruna will also be given out to all registered account during the server downtime. 100 registered 200 autorenewal
Exp/Ap event & Kruna compensation will take affect after the server reset (4:30PM PST).
Thank you.
